snippet: Kyle Okposo lifted the visiting Islanders to a 3-2 victory over the Columbus Blue Jackets on Saturday night.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Islanders defeat Columbus Blue Jackets, 3-2, in overtime; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Kyle Okposo lifted the visiting Islanders to a 3-2 victory over the Columbus Blue Jackets on Saturday night.

headline.print_headline: Islanders Defeat Blue Jackets in Overtime
headline.main: Islanders Defeat Blue Jackets in Overtime
